It highlights orbital mechanics and shadow geometry.

title: 'Won't spare ...': Trump blames 'radical left' for Charlie Kirk's killing; vows action

Trump also criticised the "radical left," claiming their rhetoric fueled the tragedy and urged Americans to uphold values like free speech and the rule of law in Kirk's memory.

title: Why competitive exam aspirants are flocking to study spaces in Chennai
description: As you walk through Anna Nagar, you will find a private study hall on nearly every corner, offering a permanent reserved seat to any aspirant for a monthly fee. These packed spaces have become the go-to individual study spots for many students.

title: US: Three students shot at Denver high school
description: Three teenagers were shot at Evergreen High School near Denver, reviving Jefferson County’s long history of school gun violence since Columbine. Parents, students, and neighbors were left shaken as survivors recounted the chaos. While victims are recovering, the tragedy underscores America’s ongoing school safety crisis, sparking renewed questions about how many wake-up calls it will take for change.

description: Vivek Agnihotri's 'The Bengal Files,' starring Mithun Chakraborty and Anupam Kher, has grossed over Rs 10 crore at the Indian box office in its first six days. Despite a strong opening weekend, collections have slowed during the weekdays. The film, the third in Agnihotri's 'Files' trilogy, faces political challenges and a reduction in show numbers, impacting the director's future projects.

The principal is also under investigation for failing to act on the victim's complaints.

President Trump mourned Kirk's death, ordering flags to be flown at half-mast. The incident sparked condemnation from political leaders across the spectrum, highlighting concerns about political violence.

description: A viral video of an Indian DoorDash worker highlights the emotional strain many Indian immigrants face in the US, caught between personal aspirations and societal exclusion. Despite forming the backbone of America’s STEM workforce, contributing to innovation, academia, and entrepreneurship, Indian professionals increasingly confront hostility, marginalization, and anti-immigrant rhetoric, revealing the paradox of reliance on talent amid growing suspicion.

The two accused villagers, who had previously raped her leading to the pregnancy, are now in custody following the woman's death. Police have registered a case and are conducting investigations, including a postmortem examination.

description: Coimbatore Medical College Hospital suspended two contract supervisors after a man was forced to carry his elderly father due to a lack of wheelchair assistance. Allegations of a staff member demanding money for a wheelchair surfaced, prompting an inquiry.

title: Heart health: Cardiologist shares ‘signs’ of heart failure you might be ignoring
description: Heart failure often starts subtly, with symptoms like fatigue, breathlessness, and swelling easily dismissed as stress or aging. Recognizing these early signs, summarized by the FACES acronym (Fatigue, Activity limitations, Congestion, Edema, Shortness of breath), is crucial. Prompt medical attention and lifestyle adjustments can significantly improve outcomes for those at risk.

title: iPhone buying guide 2025: iPhone 17 vs Air vs Pro — Which should you buy?
description: Apple's iPhone 17 lineup marks one of the most significant shake-ups in recent iPhone history. Gone is the Plus model, replaced by something entirely new: the ultra-thin iPhone Air. Combined with refreshed standard and Pro models, you've got four distinct options, each with its own personality and purpose. Let's break down each model to help you make the right choice.
